page.title: 02MRS BULLS OCCOLD OF 1935
page.content: NTERVIEW WITH PEGGY BULL- MY NANNY. PEGGY BULL WAS BORN AT CHURCH LANE. MY NANNY USED TO GO TO OCCOLD SCHOOL. THE TEACHERS WERE STRICT THERE. IN THE SCHOOL THERE USED TO BE THREE FIREPLACES BECAUSE THERE WERE THREE CLASSROOMS.IN THE PLAYGROUND,SOMETIMES THERE USED TO BE A MAN WHO HAD A BARREL ORGAN AND A MONKEY USED TO DANCE TO THE MUSIC.ALSO IN THE PLAYGROUND THEY USED TO PLAY HOOPS,SKIPPING,HOPSCOTCH, SPINNING TOP AND 5 STONES.THE GAME WAS WHEN YOU HAD 5 STONES AND THREW THEM IN THE AIR AND CAUGHT AS MANY AS YOU COULD ON THE BACK OF YOUR HAND.THE CHILDREN USED TO EAT LUNCH AT HOME,THE FOOD WAS HOMEMADE,MY NANNY DESCRIBED IT ASÂ£GOOD WHOLESOME FOODÂ£.IN THE MORNING THEY HAD SOME HORLICKS.WORK WAS QUITE HARD AT SCHOOL.WHEN MY NANNY WAS 11 SHE WENT TO HARTISMERE HIGH SCHOOL.EVERYBODY DID THE SAME WORK EVEN BACKWARD CHILDREN.
